column1: in memory of rhonda elaine trimnal carter| born: september 17
column18: brother memorial donations may be made to: summit church easley. this memorial provided by:robinson funeral home. easley
column19: sc rhonda elaine trimnal carter. september 17
column26: loving wife of daniel ""danny"" lee carter
column27: went home to be with her lord and savior on tuesday
column29: 2015 at her residence. rhonda was born in asheville
column31: 1958 to barbara ann hyatt trimnal and the late ulysses joel trimnal. she loved her family
column34: and loved to collect things. rhonda was a member of summit church in easley. she always put the needs of others in front of her own. her faithfulness and her testimony to her family
column36: and especially her lord and savior
column39: was an inspiration to all. in addition to her loving husband of 27 years and her mother
column40: rhonda is survived by two sons; matthew carter (rebekah)
column42: and justin carter of easley; two brothers; randy trimnal and jeff trimnal
column44: fla.; a grandson; logan carter; and a sister-in-law; julia carter stephens of union. in addition to her father
column45: she was preceded in death by a brother; steve trimnal. funeral services will be held at 4:00 pm on friday
column47: 2015 in the chapel of robinson funeral home - powdersville road. interment will follow at robinson memorial gardens. the family will receive friends on thursday
column49: 2015 from 5:00 pm until 8:00 pm at robinson funeral home - powdersville road
column52: sc 29642. the family is at the residence. memorial donations may be made to summit church in easley
column55: sc 29641. condolences may be expressed online at www. robinsonfuneralhomes. com or in person at robinson funeral home - powdersville road
